text: 🚨 New report reveals the harsh reality of America's healthcare affordability crisis 💸🏥 Did you know that many Americans can only afford a max monthly payment of $97 for out-of-pocket medical costs? 😱 Preventive visits, prescription drugs, mental health care, and diagnostic testing are being skipped or delayed due to unaffordability. 🤕 It's time for change! @PayZen is leading the way with AI-powered solutions to tackle healthcare affordability issues and improve patient satisfaction and financial outcomes for healthcare providers. 💪🏼
